channel.title: Following
channel.description:
How does Jagex do their following method in RuneScape?
The best method I've seen for following is [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b_RSW2Ui1VM]here[/url], where my friend simply made it so that the person following goes to the square directly behind the person they're following.

item.title: Following
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

iirc it updates the player it is following location every second or so, check out when you follow a player look at the minimap, the flag is up on the players last location every second.

Read full topic

item.title: Following
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

probably exactly that, but rather than walk to the tile behind them which is stupid, walk near the player. that is, as close as they can get to the tile but not on the tile

edit: brain engaged

Read full topic
